targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",container!="", image!=""}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", container!="", cluster_id="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
